name: Pirate Cat
description:
Oh oh! You need to escape the island but you've stolen too much gold. The hot air balloon is sinking and also there's a lot of cats that want to come with you for some reason. Escape into the ocean without jettisoning all of your stolen gold!

Controls:

Use S/down to drop gold coins (ballast) and go higher. Use W/up to vent hot air balloon air and go down. Use Left/Right to control the balloon.

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/40/pirate-cat-hot-air-balloon
